card.summary: One of the most important pilgrimage destinations in Christianity and the traditional endpoint of the Camino de Santiago.
card.style: Romanesque with Baroque and Gothic elements
facts: It is believed to house the remains of Saint James the Apostle.
Pilgrims from all over the world finish their journey here.
tips: Attend the Pilgrim’s Mass if possible.
Explore the surrounding old town after your visit.
